Songle is an interactive game in which you must guess a song based on words from the lyrics that you\'ve collected! Walk around the Edinburgh University Campus to get close enough to a placemark, and when you get there the word will be revealed to you.

This app as developed as a project for the UG3 Software Engineering Large Practical course, which takes place during the third year of students from the School of Informatics at the University of Edinburgh.
Songle was developed by student s1546270. Please contact via email at s1546270@sms.ed.ac.uk
Songle was designed and implemented between September 2017 and December 2017

The student was provided with the app concept and basic requirements, together with instructions on how to tackle several aspects of this project through lectures and labs. The design of the app and the implementation was carried out by the student, together with some additional features to enhance the usability and appeal of the application.
